lines.text: It's a high-tech microchip thermonuclear light-sensitive radioactive blue-screen laptop computer generator triple decker arachnid detector and etch-a-sketch, any more questions?
[attaching a huge tube to the vent]
It's a highly virulent malodorous toxic poison that upon contact will burn and corrode, you might want to crack a window.
[getting out a super strong vacuum cleaner]
This is my bugmatic auto-suction compressor with turbocharged instant matter multi-detachment, it really sucks.

[while trying to suck the spider with the super-vacuum]
Try this you fly-eating son of an egg-sack.

[after being tripped and crashing the dining room table]
This bug needs killing REAL bad.

[after failed killing Itsy Bitsy]
He leaves me no alternatives, but to bomb the house.
I gotta get out of here.
BOMB DE HOUSE? You mean like the Hoffmires there?
